title: WinterAid: A Donation Website
briefDescription: WinterAid is a web application designed to connect donors with volunteers to help vulnerable communities in Bangladesh by donating winter clothing.
details: WinterAid enables users to browse donation campaigns, learn about ongoing initiatives, and contribute easily to make a difference. It features user authentication, responsive design, and dynamic campaigns categorized by divisions.
challenges: Ensuring mobile-first responsiveness for all features.
lackings: Limited real-time chat system between donors and volunteers.
improvements: Add payment gateway for online donations.

title: EduLink: A Group Study Forum
briefDescription: EduLink is a web application designed to enhance group study experiences among friends, allowing collaborative assignment management.
details: EduLink allows users to create, attempt, and grade assignments collaboratively. Features include secure authentication, light/dark mode toggle, and dynamic assignment pages.
challenges: Implementing JWT-based authentication for private routes.
Developing efficient filtering and search functionality.
lackings: Lack of real-time notification for assignment updates.
improvements: Add real-time notification for assignment submissions and grading.
Include a group chat feature for better collaboration.

title: Hope Hive: Crowdfunding Websites
briefDescription: Hope Hive is a feature-rich platform showcasing modern web development techniques to deliver a seamless user experience.
details: Hope Hive offers secure authentication, campaign filtering, sorting, dynamic routing, and dark/light theme toggling. It ensures optimized performance with responsive design and interactive features.
challenges: Integrating campaign filtering and sorting by dynamic criteria.
Optimizing API performance with secure endpoints.
lackings: Limited user feedback mechanism on campaigns.
improvements: Implement a feedback and rating system for campaigns.
Enhance campaign analytics for better insights.
